stages.question: Print all the positive integers from 1 to 10, in ascending order.
Print all the positive integers from 10 to 1, in descending order.
Print all the positive multiples of 5 up to 30, in ascending order.
Print out the uppercase letters from A to Z, in their alphabetical order.
Print out the integers in the difference progression (1, 2, 4, 7, 11, 16, ...) not exceeding 100.
Print out the integers in Fibonacci sequence (1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ...) not exceeding 1000.
